M

main(String[]) - Static method in class main.controller.MainController
Usually ignored, only used if JavaFx can not not be started with start(Stage)
main.controller - package main.controller
 
main.model - package main.model
 
main.view - package main.view
 
MainController - Class in main.controller
main controller class, takes care of the initialization of the game, collision detection and keyboard handling

MainController.ClickedButton - Enum in main.controller
enum for possible clicked buttons
MainController.KeyEventHandler - Class in main.controller
the key event handler for controlling the player, so far only up, down, left and right are available

MainController.MouseEventHandlerUseButton - Class in main.controller
